game.name: Tell Me Owl
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Embark on an exciting journey in a top-down western shooter inspired by classic NES action games. Battle through handcrafted levels, buy abilities, upgrade weapons to face multi-phase bosses in a world where a man's best friend is his revolver.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on an exciting journey in a top-down western shooter inspired by classic NES action games. Battle through handcrafted levels, buy abilities, upgrade weapons to face multi-phase bosses in a world where a man's best friend is his revolver.
